modName: Twin Souls - Summon Slightly More Creatures
summary: Choose between Three Four or Five more summons for your max limit.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Changes the Twin Souls perk so you can have more summoned creatures, but not so much that it's completely overpowered.

This mod changes Twin Souls in a very small way, it does not overhaul the perk tree, it simply only increases the maximum amount of summons you can control.

You can choose from a max of 3, 4, or 5 summons at once!

[color=red]USE ONLY ONE ESP AT A TIME[/color][/size]
